channel.title: Programming on Teddy's online desktop
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Teddy's online desktop

item.title: Ideas from programming
item.description: Version Control and GitHub + Main/Branches, Push/Pull/Merge Functions/Modules Methods should be deep. Write the interface first Try to minimize exceptions define them away Be strategic + Invest in building the future/don’t introduce bad code today Write the unit test before the useful code Make sure you do input validation
